text: The Ayer Keroh Square () is a town square in Ayer Keroh, Melaka, Malaysia. ==History== The square underwent renovation starting on July 2011 with a cost of MYR1.5 million, in which MYR1 million was allocated for upgrade work on the abandoned area of the square and MYR0.5 million was allocated for landscaping work. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Malacca * List of tourist attractions in Malaysia ==References== Category:Squares in Malacca
title: Ayer Keroh Square
